00013 namespace {
00014   TaskRef root;
00015   std::vector<TaskRef> stack;
00016   StateVectorRef laststate; 
00017   PrimitiveTaskRef lastaction; 
00018   action_t dummy;

00020 
00021 void agent_init(const char* task_spec)
00022 {
00023   /*Struct to hold the parsed task spec*/
00024   taskspec_t ts;
00025   int decode_result = decode_taskspec( &ts, task_spec );
00026   if (decode_result != 0){
00027     std::cerr << "Could not decode task spec, code: " << decode_result
00028               << "for task spec: " << task_spec << std::endl; 
00029     exit(1);
00030   }
00031   assert(getNumIntAct(&ts) == 1);
00032   assert(getNumDoubleAct(&ts) == 0);
00033   allocateRLStruct(&dummy, 1, 0, 0);
00034 
00035   root = get_task_hierarchy(&ts);
00036 }
00037 
00038 const action_t *choose_action()
00039 {
00040   StatePolicyRef pi_s = (stack.empty()
00041                          ? root->policy(laststate)
00042                          : stack.back()->policy(laststate));
00043   while (pi_s) {
00044     // std::cerr << "Action values:\n";
00045     // pi_s->debug(std::cerr);
00046 
00047     stack.push_back(pi_s->policy_action());
00048     pi_s = stack.back()->policy(laststate);
00049   }
00050 
00051   lastaction = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<PrimitiveTask, Task>(stack.back());
00052   assert(lastaction != NULL);
00053   dummy.intArray[0] = lastaction->action();
00054 
00055 //   std::cout << "ACTION " << lastaction->action() << "\n"; // DEBUG
00056 //   static unsigned counter = 0;
00057 //   std::cout << "Step " << counter++ << "\n";
00058 //   if (counter++ == 2800) {
00059 //     std::vector<Task *>::iterator i;
00060 //     for (i = hierarchy.begin(); i != hierarchy.end(); ++i) {
00061 //       Task *task = *i;
00062 //       task->debug(std::cout);
00063 //     }
00064 //     exit(0);
00065 //   }
00066 
00067   // std::cerr << "State " << laststate << ", Action " << lastaction->action() << " \n"; // DEBUG
00068   // static unsigned counter2 = 0;
00069   // std::cerr << "Step " << counter2++ << "\n";
00070 
00071   return &dummy;
00072 }
00073 
00074 std::vector<double> *create_state_vector(const observation_t *o)
00075 {
00076   std::vector<double> *result = new std::vector<double>;
00077   result->insert(result->end(), o->intArray, o->intArray + o->numInts);
00078   result->insert(result->end(), o->doubleArray, o->doubleArray + o->numDoubles);
00079   return result;
00080 }
00081 
00082 const action_t *agent_start(const observation_t *o)
00083 {
00084   stack.clear();
00085   laststate = StateVectorRef(create_state_vector(o));
00086   // std::cerr << "STATE " << laststate << "\n";
00087   return choose_action();
00088 }
00089 
00090 const action_t *agent_step(double r, const observation_t *o)
00091 {
00092   StateVectorRef succ(create_state_vector(o));
00093   // std::cerr << "STATE " << succ << "\n";
00094 
00095   lastaction->update(laststate, r, succ);
00096   root->propagate_changes();
00097   // std::cerr << "agent_step: Done propagating changes.\n";
00098   while (!stack.empty() && stack.back()->terminal(succ))
00099     stack.pop_back();
00100   laststate = succ;
00101   return choose_action();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void agent_end(double r)
00105 {
00106   lastaction->update(laststate, r);
00107 
00108 //   std::for_each(hierarchy.rbegin(),
00109 //              hierarchy.rend(),
00110 //              std::mem_fun(&Task::clear));
00111 
00112   root->propagate_changes();  
00113 
00114 //   hierarchy.back()->debug(std::cout);
00115 }
00116 
00117 void agent_cleanup()
00118 {
00119   root.reset(); // XXX Need to break ref cycles to free all memory
00120   clearRLStruct(&dummy);
00121 }
00122 
00123 const char* agent_message(const char* _inMessage)
00124 {
00125   std::stringstream response;
00126   std::stringstream message(_inMessage);
00127 
00128   // Tokenize the message
00129   std::istream_iterator<std::string> it(message);
00130   std::istream_iterator<std::string> end;
00131   
00132   while (it != end) {
00133     std::string command(*it++);
00134     if (command.compare("write-value-function") == 0) {
00135       if (it == end) {
00136         response << "FittedRmaxq received write-value-function with no argument.\n";
00137       } else {
00138         boost::shared_ptr<CompositeTask> root_task =
00139           boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<CompositeTask, Task>(root);
00140         assert(root_task);
00141         std::string filename(*it++);
00142         std::fstream file(filename.c_str(), std::fstream::out);
00143         assert(file.is_open());
00144         root_task->write_value_function(file);
00145         file.close();
00146         response << "FittedRmaxq wrote root value function to " << filename << "\n";
00147       }
00148     } else if (command.compare("write-policy") == 0) {
00149       if (it == end) {
00150         response << "FittedRmaxq received write-policy with no argument.\n";
00151       } else {
00152         boost::shared_ptr<CompositeTask> root_task =
00153           boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<CompositeTask, Task>(root);
00154         assert(root_task);
00155         std::string filename(*it++);
00156         std::fstream file(filename.c_str(), std::fstream::out);
00157         assert(file.is_open());
00158         root_task->write_policy(file);
00159         file.close();
00160         response << "FittedRmaxq wrote root policy to " << filename << "\n";
00161       }
00162     } else {
00163       response << "FittedRmaxq did not understand '" << command << "'.\n";
00164     }
00165   }
00166 
00167   static std::string buffer;
00168   buffer = response.str();
00169   return buffer.c_str();
00170 }
